sys_openapi_operation.name: Updates an existing asset. - (PATCH) /assetmgmt/assets/templateId/{templateId}/{assetId}
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation:
{"fName":"Updates an existing asset.","fOperationId":"modifyByImport","fDescription":"Updates an existing asset. The request body should contain a key:value mapping from field ids to desired values. You can use the cardTypes operation to retrieve the available fields on a template (including their id and type). The following rules apply:
  • Values must be in the correct format for that field's type:
    • BOOLEAN: A json boolean.
    • NUMBER: A json number.
    • STRING: A json string.
    • DATE: A json string in ISO 8601 format.
    • FOREIGN_KEY: A json string in uuid format.
    • FOREIGN_KEY_LIST: A json array of json strings in uuid format.
  • Only the specified fields will be updated, all others remain unchanged.
  • To clear a value, set the field to null. Required fields cannot be cleared.
  • The name of each asset must remain unique among _all_ assets (including assets of different types).
  • If the asset to be updated is archived, it will be unarchived as a result of this operation.


| Permission | Remarks | | --- | --- | | Operator | With write permission for assets, and permission to (un)archive assets if the specified asset is archived | | Person | No access |","fPath":"/assetmgmt/assets/templateId/{templateId}/{assetId}","fHttpMethod":"PATCH","fDeprecated":false,"fRequest":{"fDescription":"A flat json object representing the asset to be updated. The keys are field ids and the values are the asset's values for those fields.","fRequired":true,"fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"requestapplicationjson7616496336","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"object","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fAdditionalProperties":{"value":{"fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"object","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}},"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}]},"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"successful operation","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson0037335718","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/ModifiedAssetResponse","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"400","fDescription":"Possible causes:
  • Some key in the request body is not an id of a field on the asset template.
  • Some value in the request body does not have the correct format for that field's type.
  • A mandatory field is cleared.
  • The name of the asset is not unique.
","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson6228847928","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/BadRequestEntity","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"404","fDescription":"Possible causes:
  • The specified asset template does not exist.
  • The specified asset template is archived.
  • The specified asset does not exist.
","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]}],"fParameters":[{"fName":"templateId","fDescription":"The template id specifying the type of the asset.","fRequired":true,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"path","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"simple","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"templateId3007830732","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fFormat":"uuid","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]},{"fName":"assetId","fDescription":"The id of the asset to be updated.","fRequired":true,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"path","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"simple","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"assetId4196933560","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fFormat":"uuid","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]}]}
